Package edu.monash.fit2099

Class CarAuction

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.CarAuction
public class CarAuction
extends java.lang.Object
CarAuction class is a class that handles all the core activities such as creating sport car/cruiserbike/bid/client and so on. It is also responsible to display the menu items.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    CarAuction()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    int carMenuItem()
    this method will printout the carMenu in console and prompt the user for an input
    void createBid()
    this method will prompt the user to input the bid details and then it will call the addBid() in BidManager class.
    void createClient()
    this method will prompt the user to input the client details and then create a client instance
    void createCruiseBike()
    this method will be called when the user wish to create a cruisebike so that it will prompt for user input and take in the details and store it the vehicles list
    void createSportCar()
    this method will be called when the user wish to create a sport car so that it will prompt for user input and take in the details and store it the vehicles list
    void displayCarMenu()
    This method will take care of the user input of carMenuitem()
    void displayClients()
    This method will display all the clients the users have created/inputted
    void displayFleet()
    This method will display all the vehicles the users have created/inputted
    void printStatus()
    This method will invoke the i/o menu method which is displayCarMenu()

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • CarAuction

      public CarAuction()

  • Method Details

    • printStatus

      public void printStatus()
      This method will invoke the i/o menu method which is displayCarMenu()

    • createSportCar

      public void createSportCar()
      this method will be called when the user wish to create a sport car so that it will prompt for user input and take in the details and store it the vehicles list
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - will throw an exception if the user input is invalid.

    • createCruiseBike

      public void createCruiseBike()
      this method will be called when the user wish to create a cruisebike so that it will prompt for user input and take in the details and store it the vehicles list
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - will throw an exception if the user input is invalid.

    • createClient

      public void createClient()
      this method will prompt the user to input the client details and then create a client instance

    • createBid

      public void createBid()
      this method will prompt the user to input the bid details and then it will call the addBid() in BidManager class.

    • displayFleet

      public void displayFleet()
      This method will display all the vehicles the users have created/inputted

    • displayClients

      public void displayClients()
      This method will display all the clients the users have created/inputted

    • displayCarMenu

      public void displayCarMenu()
      This method will take care of the user input of carMenuitem()

    • carMenuItem

      public int carMenuItem()
      this method will printout the carMenu in console and prompt the user for an input
      Returns:
      an integer representing the user's input of choice for a certain action
